name: Tunnels (TargonStudios)
description:
Use echolocation to navigate the darkness of the tunnels and find your way out. But beware, you're not the only shrew down there. Whatever you do, just don't make a sound.

This game was made in 3 hours for the 'Trijam #42: The Spoopy 3 hour game jam'. Only the music isn't made by myself (it being royalty free).
